content.question: Which of the following statements best describes the harmonic analysis and the voice leading of the last two chords?

choices.label: The last two chords are analyzed as Ⅴ7/ⅵ — ⅵ; the chordal seventh resolves down by step.
The last two chords are analyzed as Ⅴ7/ⅵ — ⅵ; the chordal seventh resolves down by leap.
The last two chords are analyzed as ⅶo7/ⅵ — ⅵ; the chordal seventh resolves down by step.
The last two chords are analyzed as ⅶo7/ⅵ — ⅵ; the chordal seventh resolves down by leap.

content.answer: The last two chords are analyzed as ⅶo7/ⅵ — ⅵ; the chordal seventh resolves down by step.
